text: Follow the Sun is a 1951 American biographical drama movie directed by Sidney Lanfield and stars Glenn Ford, Anne Baxter, Dennis O'Keefe, June Havoc, Larry Keating, Roland Winters. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 drama movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lanfield
title: Follow the Sun
